FuncDef:
The pw command displays the VSI-BGP-PW view of a created PW.
The undo pw command quits the VSI-BGP-PW view of a created PW.
By default, no VSI-BGP-PW view is displayed.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a PW.
The value is a string of 1 to 15 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If a PW has been configured in the VSI-BGP or VSI-BGP-MH view, run the pw pw-name command to enter the VSI-BGP-PW view corresponding to the PW Name.
In the VSI-BGP-PW view, you can configure BUM traffic suppression for PWS on a BGP VPLS Multi-homing network.
Prerequisites
A PW has been created in the VSI-BGP or VSI-BGP-MH view using the peer peer-address remote-site remote-site-id pw pw-name command.
